response.explain: According to the original subtasks and previous action code, the robot has moved to the tray successfully. Therefore, the next step is to have the robot pick up the bacon.
response.subtask:
(1) Move the robot to the tray.
(2) Pickup the bacon.
(3) Move the robot to the stove.
(4) Cook the bacon.
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
    # Subtask 2: Pickup the Bacon
    bacon = registry(env, "bacon_150")
    EasyGrasp(robot, bacon)
    donothing(env)
